014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
018import static java.lang.String.format;
019import static org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.IgnoreWarnFail.checkIgnoreWarnFailState;
020
021import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.DateDefinition;
022import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.FieldDefinition;
023import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.MacroDefinition;
024import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.NumberDefinition;
025import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.StringDefinition;
026import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.UuidDefinition;
027import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.fields.NumberField;
028import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.groups.PropertyField;
029import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.groups.PropertyGroup;
030import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.macros.MacroType;
031
032import java.io.File;
033import java.io.IOException;
034import java.util.AbstractMap.SimpleImmutableEntry;
035import java.util.Arrays;
036import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
037import java.util.List;
038import java.util.Map;
039import java.util.Map.Entry;
040import java.util.Properties;
041import java.util.Set;
042import javax.inject.Inject;
043
044import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList;
045import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
046import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet;
047import com.google.common.flogger.FluentLogger;
048import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
049import org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo;
050import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
051import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
052import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
053import org.apache.maven.settings.Settings;
054
055public abstract class AbstractPropertyHelperMojo extends AbstractMojo implements FieldContext {
056
057    private static final FluentLogger LOG = FluentLogger.forEnclosingClass();
058
059    protected final ValueCache valueCache = new ValueCache();
060    private IgnoreWarnFail onDuplicateField = IgnoreWarnFail.FAIL;
061
062    /**
063     * Defines the action to take if a field is defined multiple times (e.g. as a number and a string).
064     * <br>
065     * Options are
066     * <ul>
067     *     <li><code>ignore</code> - ignore multiple definitions silently, retain just the first one found</li>
068     *     <li><code>warn</code> - like ignore, but also log a warning message</li>
069     *     <li><code>fail</code> - fail the build with an exception</li>
070     * </ul>
071     */
072    @Parameter(defaultValue = "fail", alias = "onDuplicateProperty")
073    public void setOnDuplicateField(String onDuplicateField) {
074        this.onDuplicateField = IgnoreWarnFail.forString(onDuplicateField);
075    }
076
077    private List<String> activeGroups = List.of();
078
079    /**
080     * The property groups to activate. If none are given, all property groups are activated.
081     * <pre>{@code
082     * <activeGroups>
083     *     <activeGroup>group1</activeGroup>
084     *     <activeGroup>group2</activeGroup>
085     *     ...
086     * </activeGroups>
087     * }</pre>
088     */
089    @Parameter
090    public void setActiveGroups(String... activeGroups) {
091        this.activeGroups = Arrays.asList(activeGroups);
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Define property groups. A property group contains one or more property definitions. Property groups are active by default
096     * unless they are explicitly listed with {@code <activeGroups>...</activeGroups}.
097     * <pre>{@code
098     * <propertyGroups>
099     *     <propertyGroup>
100     *         <id>...</id>
101     *         <activeOnRelease>true|false</activeOnRelease>
102     *         <activeOnSnapshot>true|false</activeOnSnapshot>
103     *         <onDuplicateProperty>ignore|warn|fail</onDuplicateProperty>
104     *         <onMissingProperty>ignore|warn|fail</onMissingProperty>
105     *         <properties>
106     *             <property>
107     *                 <name></name>
108     *                 <value></value>
109     *                 <transformers>...</transformers>
110     *             </property>
111     *         </properties>
112     *     </propertyGroup>
113     *     ...
114     * </propertyGroups>
115     * }</pre>
116     */
117    @Parameter
118    public void setPropertyGroups(PropertyGroup... propertyGroups) {
119        this.propertyGroups = Arrays.asList(propertyGroups);
120    }
121
122    private List<PropertyGroup> propertyGroups = List.of();
123
124    /**
125     * Number property definitions.
126     *
127     * <pre>{@code
128     * <numbers>
129     *     <number>
130     *         <id>...</id>
131     *         <skip>true|false</skip>
132     *         <export>true|false</export>
133     *
134     *         <initialValue></initialValue>
135     *         <format></format>
136     *         <fieldNumber></fieldNumber>
137     *         <increment></increment>
138     *         <transformers>...</transformers>
139     *
140     *         <propertyFile></propertyFile>
141     *         <propertyNameInFile></propertyNameInFile>
142     *         <onMissingFile></onMissingFile>
143     *         <onMissingProperty></onMissingProperty>
144     *     </number>
145     *     ...
146     * </numbers>
147     * }</pre>
148     */
149    @Parameter
150    public void setNumbers(NumberDefinition... numberDefinitions) {
151        this.numberDefinitions = Arrays.asList(numberDefinitions);
152    }
153
154    private List<NumberDefinition> numberDefinitions = List.of();
155
156    /**
157     * String property definitions.
158     *
159     * <pre>{@code
160     * <strings>
161     *     <string>
162     *         <id>...</id>
163     *         <skip>true|false</skip>
164     *         <export>true|false</export>
165     *
166     *         <initialValue>...</initialValue>
167     *         <format></format>
168     *         <values>
169     *             <value>...</value>
170     *         </values>
171     *         <blankIsValid>true|false</blankIsValid>
172     *         <onMissingValue>ignore|warn|fail</onMissingValue
173     *         <transformers>...</transformers>
174     *
175     *         <propertyFile></propertyFile>
176     *         <propertyNameInFile></propertyNameInFile>
177     *         <onMissingFile></onMissingFile>
178     *         <onMissingProperty></onMissingProperty>
179     *     </string>
180     * </strings>
181     * }</pre>
182     */
183    @Parameter
184    public void setStrings(StringDefinition... stringDefinitions) {
185        this.stringDefinitions = Arrays.asList(stringDefinitions);
186    }
187
188    private List<StringDefinition> stringDefinitions = List.of();
189
190    /**
191     * Date property definitions.
192     *
193     * <pre>{@code
194     * <dates>
195     *     <date>
196     *         <id>...</id>
197     *         <skip>true|false</skip>
198     *         <export>true|false</export>
199     *
200     *         <initialValue></initialValue>
201     *         <value></value>
202     *         <format></format>
203     *         <timezone></timezone>
204     *         <transformers>...</transformers>
205     *
206     *         <propertyFile></propertyFile>
207     *         <propertyNameInFile></propertyNameInFile>
208     *         <onMissingFile></onMissingFile>
209     *         <onMissingProperty></onMissingProperty>
210     *     </date>
211     * </dates>
212     * }</pre>
213     */
214    @Parameter
215    public void setDates(DateDefinition... dateDefinitions) {
216        this.dateDefinitions = Arrays.asList(dateDefinitions);
217    }
218
219    private List<DateDefinition> dateDefinitions = List.of();
220
221    /**
222     * Macro definitions.
223     *
224     * <pre>{@code
225     * <macros>
226     *     <macro>
227     *         <id>...</id>
228     *         <skip>true|false</skip>
229     *         <export>true|false</export>
230     *
231     *         <macroType></macroType>
232     *         <macroClass></macroClass>
233     *         <properties>
234     *             <property></property>
235     *         </properties>
236     *
237     *         <initialValue></initialValue>
238     *         <format></format>
239     *         <transformers>...</transformers>
240     *
241     *         <propertyFile></propertyFile>
242     *         <propertyNameInFile></propertyNameInFile>
243     *         <onMissingFile></onMissingFile>
244     *         <onMissingProperty></onMissingProperty>
245     *     </macro>
246     * </macros>
247     * }</pre>
248     */
249    @Parameter
250    public void setMacros(MacroDefinition... macroDefinitions) {
251        this.macroDefinitions = Arrays.asList(macroDefinitions);
252    }
253
254    private List<MacroDefinition> macroDefinitions = List.of();
255
256    /**
257     * Uuid definitions.
258     *
259     * <pre>{@code
260     * <uuids>
261     *     <uuid>
262     *         <id>...</id>
263     *         <skip>true|false</skip>
264     *         <export>true|false</export>
265     *
266     *         <initialValue></initialValue>
267     *         <value></value>
268     *         <format></format>
269     *         <transformers>...</transformers>
270     *
271     *         <propertyFile></propertyFile>
272     *         <propertyNameInFile></propertyNameInFile>
273     *         <onMissingFile></onMissingFile>
274     *         <onMissingProperty></onMissingProperty>
275     *     </uuid>
276     * </uuids>
277     * }</pre>
278     */
279    @Parameter
280    public void setUuids(UuidDefinition... uuidDefinitions) {
281        this.uuidDefinitions = Arrays.asList(uuidDefinitions);
282    }
283
284    private List<UuidDefinition> uuidDefinitions = List.of();
285
286    /**
287     * The maven project (effective pom).
288     */
289    @Parameter(defaultValue = "${project}", readonly = true)
290    MavenProject project;
291
292    @Parameter(defaultValue = "${settings}", readonly = true)
293    Settings settings;
294
295    @Parameter(required = true, readonly = true, defaultValue = "${project.basedir}")
296    File basedir;
297
298    /**
299     * If set to true, goal execution is skipped.
300     */
301    @Parameter(defaultValue = "false")
302    boolean skip;
303
304
305    @Inject
306    public void setMacroMap(Map<String, MacroType> macroMap) {
307        this.macroMap = ImmutableMap.copyOf(macroMap);
308    }
309
310    private Map<String, MacroType> macroMap = Map.of();
311
312    // internal mojo state.
313    private boolean isSnapshot;
314    private InterpolatorFactory interpolatorFactory;
315
316    private Map<String, FieldDefinition<?>> fieldDefinitions = Map.of();
317    private List<NumberField> numberFields = List.of();
318    private Map<String, String> values = Map.of();
319
320    @Override
321    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
322        this.isSnapshot = project.getArtifact().isSnapshot();
323        this.interpolatorFactory = new InterpolatorFactory(project.getModel());
324
325        LOG.atFine().log("Current build is a %s project.", isSnapshot ? "snapshot" : "release");
326        LOG.atFiner().log("On duplicate field definitions: %s", onDuplicateField);
327
328        try {
329            if (skip) {
330                LOG.atFine().log("skipping plugin execution!");
331            } else {
332                doExecute();
333            }
334        } catch (IOException e) {
335            throw new MojoExecutionException("While running mojo: ", e);
336        }
337    }
338
339    @Override
340    public MavenProject getProject() {
341        return project;
342    }
343
344    @Override
345    public File getBasedir() {
346        return basedir;
347    }
348
349    @Override
350    public Settings getSettings() {
351        return settings;
352    }
353
354    @Override
355    public Map<String, MacroType> getMacros() {
356        return macroMap;
357    }
358
359    @Override
360    public Properties getProperties() {
361        return project.getProperties();
362    }
363
364    protected List<NumberField> getNumbers() {
365        return numberFields;
366    }
367
368    /**
369     * Subclasses need to implement this method.
370     */
371    protected abstract void doExecute() throws IOException, MojoExecutionException;
372
373    private void addDefinitions(ImmutableMap.Builder<String, FieldDefinition<?>> builder, List<? extends FieldDefinition<?>> newDefinitions) {
374        Map<String, FieldDefinition<?>> existingDefinitions = builder.build();
375
376        for (FieldDefinition<?> definition : newDefinitions) {
377            final String propertyName = definition.getId();
378
379            if (checkIgnoreWarnFailState(!existingDefinitions.containsKey(propertyName), onDuplicateField,
380                () -> format("field definition '%s' does not exist", propertyName),
381                () -> format("field definition '%s' already exists!", propertyName))) {
382                builder.put(propertyName, definition);
383            }
384        }
385    }
386
387    protected void createFieldDefinitions() {
388
389        final ImmutableMap.Builder<String, FieldDefinition<?>> builder = ImmutableMap.builder();
390        addDefinitions(builder, numberDefinitions);
391        addDefinitions(builder, stringDefinitions);
392        addDefinitions(builder, macroDefinitions);
393        addDefinitions(builder, dateDefinitions);
394        addDefinitions(builder, uuidDefinitions);
395
396        this.fieldDefinitions = builder.build();
397    }
398
399    protected void createFields() throws MojoExecutionException, IOException {
400        ImmutableList.Builder<NumberField> numberFields = ImmutableList.builder();
401
402        var builder = ImmutableMap.<String, String>builder();
403
404        for (FieldDefinition<?> definition : fieldDefinitions.values()) {
405            Field<?, ?> field = definition.createField(this, valueCache);
406
407            if (field instanceof NumberField) {
408                numberFields.add((NumberField) field);
409            }
410
411            var fieldValue = interpolatorFactory.interpolate(field.getFieldName(), IgnoreWarnFail.FAIL, Map.of()).apply(field.getValue());
412            builder.put(field.getFieldName(), fieldValue);
413
414            if (field.isExposeAsProperty()) {
415                project.getProperties().setProperty(field.getFieldName(), fieldValue);
416                LOG.atFine().log("Exporting Property name: %s, value: %s", field.getFieldName(), fieldValue);
417            } else {
418                LOG.atFine().log("Property name: %s, value: %s", field.getFieldName(), fieldValue);
419            }
420        }
421
422        this.numberFields = numberFields.build();
423        this.values = builder.build();
424    }
425
426    // generates the property groups.
427    @SuppressFBWarnings(value = "WMI_WRONG_MAP_ITERATOR")
428    public void createGroups() throws MojoExecutionException, IOException {
429        final ImmutableMap.Builder<String, Entry<PropertyGroup, List<PropertyField>>> propertyGroupBuilder = ImmutableMap.builder();
430
431        Set<String> exportedFields = fieldDefinitions.values().stream()
432            .filter(FieldDefinition::isExport)
433            .map(FieldDefinition::getId).collect(ImmutableSet.toImmutableSet());
434
435        final Set<String> propertyNames = new LinkedHashSet<>(exportedFields);
436
437        for (final PropertyGroup propertyGroup : propertyGroups) {
438            final List<PropertyField> propertyFields = propertyGroup.createFields(values, interpolatorFactory);
439            propertyGroupBuilder.put(propertyGroup.getId(), new SimpleImmutableEntry<>(propertyGroup, propertyFields));
440        }
441
442        final Map<String, Entry<PropertyGroup, List<PropertyField>>> propertyPairs = propertyGroupBuilder.build();
443
444        var groupsToAdd = !this.activeGroups.isEmpty() ? this.activeGroups : propertyPairs.keySet();
445
446        for (final String groupToAdd : groupsToAdd) {
447            final var activeGroup = propertyPairs.get(groupToAdd);
448            checkState(activeGroup != null, "activated group '%s' does not exist", activeGroup);
449
450            final PropertyGroup propertyGroup = activeGroup.getKey();
451
452            if ((propertyGroup.isActiveOnRelease() && !isSnapshot) || (propertyGroup.isActiveOnSnapshot() && isSnapshot)) {
453                for (final PropertyField propertyField : activeGroup.getValue()) {
454                    final String fieldName = propertyField.getFieldName();
455
456                    if (checkIgnoreWarnFailState(!propertyNames.contains(fieldName), propertyGroup.getOnDuplicateProperty(),
457                        () -> format("property '%s' is not exposed", fieldName),
458                        () -> format("property '%s' is already exposed!", fieldName))) {
459
460                        project.getProperties().setProperty(fieldName, propertyField.getValue());
461                    }
462                }
463            } else {
464                LOG.atFine().log("Skipping property group %s: Snapshot: %b, activeOnSnapshot: %b, activeOnRelease: %b", activeGroup, isSnapshot,
465                    propertyGroup.isActiveOnSnapshot(), propertyGroup.isActiveOnRelease());
466            }
467        }
468    }
469}
